nodes.id: 毛泽东逝世及追悼活动

zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世及追悼活动
en: Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 1976年9月9日，中国共产党中央委员会主席毛泽东在北京逝世，随后中国政府为其举行的规模宏大的全国性追悼活动。
description.en: On September 9, 1976, Mao Zedong, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, passed away in Beijing, followed by a large-scale national memorial service held by the Chinese government.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 肌萎缩性脊髓侧索硬化症

zh-cn: 肌萎缩性脊髓侧索硬化症

description.zh-cn: 一种运动神经元疾病，李志绥在其回忆录中称毛泽东患有此病。
description.en: A motor neuron disease that Li Zhisui claimed in his memoir that Mao Zedong suffered from.

description.zh-cn: 一种急性、严重的心脏病。1976年6月初，毛泽东突患此病。
description.en: An acute and severe heart condition. Mao Zedong suffered a sudden myocardial infarction in early June 1976.

nodes.id: 告全党全军全国各族人民书

zh-cn: 告全党全军全国各族人民书
en: Message to the Whole Party, the Whole Army and the People of All Nationalities Throughout the Country

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央、全国人大常委会、国务院、中央军委联合发布的，宣告毛泽东逝世的讣告。
description.en: The official obituary announcing the death of Mao Zedong, jointly issued by the CPC Central Committee, the NPC Standing Committee, the State Council, and the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东逝世后的中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician, the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China after Mao Zedong's death.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世后，华国锋、叶剑英、汪东兴等人发动的一场政治行动，逮捕了江青等“四人帮”成员，结束了文化大革命。
description.en: A political action launched by Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing and others after Mao Zedong's death, which led to the arrest of the 'Gang of Four' including Jiang Qing, and marked the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的持续十年的政治运动。
description.en: A decade-long political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 指文化大革命后期，由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成的中共党内政治团体。
description.en: A political faction within the Communist Party of China during the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, composed of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”核心成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, the fourth wife of Mao Zedong, and a core member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的元勋，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A founding father of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任，深度参与“粉碎四人帮”行动。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, who was deeply involved in the 'Smash the Gang of Four' action.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构，党和国家的决策核心。
description.en: The leading body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and the core decision-making body of the party and state.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京天安门广场，为永久保存毛泽东遗体而建造的纪念性建筑。
description.en: A memorial building located in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, built to permanently preserve the body of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放的总设计师，中华人民共和国第二代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: The chief architect of China's reform and opening-up, and the core of the second generation of central leadership of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国与苏联之间在20世纪60年代至80年代发生的政治、意识形态和国家关系上的长期对立与冲突。
description.en: Refers to the long-term political, ideological, and state-level confrontation and conflict between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union from the 1960s to the 1980s.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的执政党和唯一合法政党。
description.en: The ruling and only legal political party in the Soviet Union.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府负责外交事务的部门。
description.en: The department of the government of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

nodes.id: 苏共中央就毛泽东逝世发来的唁电

zh-cn: 苏共中央就毛泽东逝世发来的唁电
en: Condolence message from the CPSU Central Committee on the death of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党中央委员会就毛泽东逝世向中国发出的唁电，但因中苏交恶被中方拒收。
description.en: A message of condolence sent by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union to China on the death of Mao Zedong, which was rejected by the Chinese side due to the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中国在朝鲜战争期间发起的，旨在支持朝鲜、抵抗美国及其盟军的军事和政治运动。
description.en: A military and political campaign launched by China during the Korean War to support North Korea and resist the United States and its allies.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔巴尼亚社会主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Socialist Republic of Albania.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东提出的关于国际关系格局的理论，将世界划分为三个部分。
description.en: A theory on the structure of international relations proposed by Mao Zedong, which divides the world into three parts.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国与阿尔巴尼亚社会主义人民共和国在20世纪70年代末的外交关系破裂。
description.en: Refers to the breakdown of diplomatic relations between the People's Republic of China and the People's Socialist Republic of Albania in the late 1970s.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事家、政治家，法兰西第五共和国的创建者。
description.en: French general and statesman, founder of the French Fifth Republic.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫革命家、政治家，南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国的缔造者。
description.en: Yugoslav revolutionary and statesman, the founder of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

nodes.id: 南斯拉夫共产主义者联盟

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫共产主义者联盟

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在台湾的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Kuomintang in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: Politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世后，由时任中华民国行政院院长蒋经国发表的文告，号召中国大陆人民“抗暴革命”。
description.en: A proclamation issued by Chiang Ching-kuo, then Premier of the Republic of China, after Mao Zedong's death, calling on the people of mainland China to 'revolt against tyranny'.

description.zh-cn: 1976年4月5日发生在北京天安门广场，以悼念周恩来为名，实为反对“四人帮”的群众性抗议活动。
description.en: A mass protest that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing on April 5, 1976, ostensibly to mourn Zhou Enlai but in reality to oppose the 'Gang of Four'.

relationships.source: 毛泽东逝世及追悼活动

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1976年9月9日0时10分在北京逝世，结束了其生命和政治生涯。
description.en: Mao Zedong passed away in Beijing at 00:10 on September 9, 1976, ending his life and political career.

relationships.source: 肌萎缩性脊髓侧索硬化症

description.zh-cn: 据李志绥的回忆录，毛泽东患有肌萎缩性脊髓侧索硬化症，这是其死亡的原因之一。
description.en: According to Li Zhisui's memoir, Mao Zedong suffered from amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, which was one of the causes of his death.

description.zh-cn: 1976年6月初，毛泽东突患心肌梗塞，经抢救脱险，但健康状况急剧恶化。
description.en: In early June 1976, Mao Zedong suffered a sudden myocardial infarction. Although he was saved, his health deteriorated rapidly.

description.zh-cn: 台湾《中央日报》的报道称，四五天安门事件加剧了毛泽东的病情，是他的“催命符”。
description.en: According to Taiwan's Central Daily News, the Tiananmen Incident aggravated Mao Zedong's illness and was his 'death warrant'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 告全党全军全国各族人民书

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会是联合发表《告全党全军全国各族人民书》的机构之一。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was one of the bodies that jointly issued the 'Message to the Whole Party, the Whole Army and the People of All Nationalities Throughout the Country'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 告全党全军全国各族人民书

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会是联合发表《告全党全军全国各族人民书》的机构之一。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC was one of the bodies that jointly issued the 'Message to the Whole Party, the Whole Army and the People of All Nationalities Throughout the Country'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 告全党全军全国各族人民书

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院是联合发表《告全党全军全国各族人民书》的机构之一。
description.en: The State Council of the People's Republic of China was one of the bodies that jointly issued the 'Message to the Whole Party, the Whole Army and the People of All Nationalities Throughout the Country'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
relationships.target: 告全党全军全国各族人民书

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会是联合发表《告全党全军全国各族人民书》的机构之一。
description.en: The Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China was one of the bodies that jointly issued the 'Message to the Whole Party, the Whole Army and the People of All Nationalities Throughout the Country'.

relationships.source: 毛泽东逝世及追悼活动

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的逝世导致权力真空，促使华国锋等人采取行动，于一个月后发动“粉碎四人帮”事件。
description.en: Mao Zedong's death created a power vacuum, prompting Hua Guofeng and others to take action, launching the 'Smash the Gang of Four' incident a month later.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋作为时任中共中央第一副主席，是“粉碎四人帮”行动的主要决策者和领导者。
description.en: As the First Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee at the time, Hua Guofeng was the main decision-maker and leader of the 'Smash the Gang of Four' action.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英是“粉碎四人帮”行动的重要支持者和参与者。
description.en: Ye Jianying was a key supporter and participant in the 'Smash the Gang of Four' action.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴作为时任中共中央办公厅主任，具体执行了抓捕“四人帮”的行动。
description.en: As the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, Wang Dongxing carried out the arrest of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: “粉碎四人帮”事件标志着持续十年的文化大革命的结束。
description.en: The 'Smash the Gang of Four' incident marked the end of the ten-year Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: “粉碎四人帮”事件通过隔离审查的方式，终结了“四人帮”政治集团。
description.en: The 'Smash the Gang of Four' incident ended the 'Gang of Four' political faction through their arrest and investigation.

description.zh-cn: 江青是毛泽东的第四任妻子。
description.en: Jiang Qing was the fourth wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 出于政治需要，中共中央政治局决定违背毛泽东生前意愿，永久保留其遗体并建立纪念堂。
description.en: For political reasons, the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee decided against Mao Zedong's own wishes to permanently preserve his body and build a memorial hall.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在接受意大利记者采访时表示，毛主席纪念堂将会被保留下来。
description.en: In an interview with an Italian journalist, Deng Xiaoping stated that the Chairman Mao Memorial Hall would be preserved.

description.zh-cn: 由于中苏交恶，中共与苏共关系中断，以至于在毛泽东逝世后，中方拒收了苏共发来的唁电。
description.en: Due to the Sino-Soviet split, relations between the CPC and the CPSU were severed, leading to China's rejection of the condolence message from the CPSU after Mao Zedong's death.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 苏共中央就毛泽东逝世发来的唁电

description.zh-cn: 由于中苏交恶，中华人民共和国外交部拒收了苏联共产党以党的名义发来的唁电。
description.en: Due to the Sino-Soviet split, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC rejected the condolence message sent by the Communist Party of the Soviet Union in the party's name.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在唁电中称毛泽东是“朝鲜人民最亲密的战友”。
description.en: In his condolence message, Kim Il Sung referred to Mao Zedong as 'the closest comrade-in-arms of the Korean people'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东领导中国在朝鲜战争期间发起抗美援朝运动，以鲜血援助了朝鲜。
description.en: Mao Zedong led China to launch the 'Resist America, Aid Korea' campaign during the Korean War, providing crucial support to North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔巴尼亚劳动党在唁电中称毛泽东为“最亲爱和最尊贵的朋友”。
description.en: In its condolence message, the Party of Labour of Albania called Mao Zedong 'their dearest and most respected friend'.

relationships.source: 毛泽东逝世及追悼活动

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的逝世并没有缓和中阿两党间日益加深的分歧，随后阿尔巴尼亚开始公开批判三个世界理论，最终导致中阿关系彻底决裂。
description.en: The death of Mao Zedong did not ease the growing differences between the Chinese and Albanian parties; subsequently, Albania began to openly criticize the Three Worlds Theory, eventually leading to the complete breakdown of Sino-Albanian relations.

description.zh-cn: 1977年，阿尔巴尼亚劳动党开始公开批判毛泽东的三个世界理论，称其“背离马列主义”。
description.en: In 1977, the Party of Labour of Albania began to openly criticize Mao Zedong's Three Worlds Theory, calling it a 'deviation from Marxism-Leninism'.

description.zh-cn: 法国总统的唁电中提及，戴高乐将军深切敬仰毛泽东，并与他共同促成了中法两国互相接近。
description.en: The French president's condolence message mentioned that General de Gaulle deeply admired Mao Zedong and worked with him to foster closer relations between China and France.

description.zh-cn: 铁托是毛主席纪念堂落成之后，首位前往瞻仰毛泽东遗容的外国领导人。
description.en: Tito was the first foreign leader to visit the Chairman Mao Memorial Hall and pay respects to Mao's remains after its completion.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党党报《中央日报》在头版以“祸国殃民·百死莫赎 毛匪泽东毙命”为标题报道了毛泽东的死讯。
description.en: The Kuomintang's official newspaper, Central Daily News, reported Mao Zedong's death on its front page with the headline 'A Scourge to the Nation, a Criminal Whose Death Cannot Atone for His Sins, the Bandit Mao Zedong is Dead'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国行政院院长蒋经国在毛泽东逝世后发表《告大陆同胞书》。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo, then Premier of the Republic of China, issued the 'Message to Compatriots in Mainland China' after Mao Zedong's death.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国发表的《告大陆同胞书》号召中国大陆同胞、中共干部及官兵进行“抗暴革命”，以“彻底摧毁毛共暴政”。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo's 'Message to Compatriots in Mainland China' called on the people, cadres, and soldiers of mainland China to wage a 'revolt against tyranny' to 'completely destroy the tyrannical Maoist communist regime'.
